channel.title: IWCP: University of Michigan
channel.description: Recent content on IWCP: University of Michigan

item.title: Presentation: Deanna Kolberg
item.description: Informal Communities and Data Reporting Bias Please join us for Deanna’s talk on November 22, 2019.

item.title: Presentation: Sarah Khan (Yale University)
item.description: Please join us for a guest speaker, Sarah Khan, on November 8, 2019.

item.title: Presentation: Nahomi Ichino
item.description: Methods of Differences: Credible Research Design and Analysis with Qualitative Information Co-Authored with Adam Glynn (Emory University) Please join us for Nahomi’s presentation on November 1, 2019.

item.title: Practice Job Talk: Todd Lehmann
item.description: Please join us for Todd Lehmann’s practice job talk on October 11, 2019.

item.title: Practice Job Talk: Yilang Feng
item.description: Please join us for Yilang Feng’s practice job talk on October 4, 2019.

item.title: Presentation: Ron Inglehart
item.description: “From Authoritarian Personality to Authoritarian Reflex- Evolving Views of an Enduring Phenomenon” Please join us for Ron’s talk on September 20th from 1:00-2:30 in the PreFunction Room.

item.title: Practice Job Talk: Kirill Zhirkov
item.description: Please join us for Kirill Zhirkov’s practice job talk on September 13, 2019
About Hello! We are IWCP. We are interested in comparative politics. Our Team Michael Lerner Guoer Liu Julia Maynard

item.title: Contact
item.description: You can contact us via email at: Michael Lerner, Guoer Liu, Julia Maynard, If you are interested in signing up, please fill this Google Form.
